00163 MAMAExpDLL
00164 extern mama_status
00165 mamaFieldCache_applyField(mamaFieldCache fieldCache,
00166                           const mamaFieldCacheField field);
00167 /*
00168  * This function will automatically populate the field cache from the contents
00169  * of the supplied message. Fields within the messages will be added to the cache
00170  * if not already present. If the field is already present then the data will be
00171  * updated.
00172  *
00173  * @param fieldCache (in) The field cache to populate.
00174  * @param message (in) The <code>mamaMsg</code> to use to populate the cache.
00175  * @param dictionary (in) The dictionary (optional: can be NULL).
00176  * @return Resulting status of the call which can be
00177  *      MAMA_STATUS_NULL_ARG  
00178  *      MAMA_STATUS_OK
00179  *      Other error codes from the mama functions. 
00180  */
00181 MAMAExpDLL
00182 extern mama_status
00183 mamaFieldCache_applyMessage(mamaFieldCache fieldCache,
00184                             const mamaMsg message,
00185                             mamaDictionary dictionary);
00186 
00187 /*
00188  * This function will automatically populate the field cache from the contents
00189  * of the supplied mamaFieldCacheRecord. Fields within the record will be added
00190  * to the cache if not already present. If the field is already present then the
00191  * data will be updated.
00192  *
00193  * @param fieldCache (in) The field cache to populate.
00194  * @param record (in) The <code>mamaFieldCacheRecord</code> to use to populate the cache.
00195  * @return Resulting status of the call which can be
00196  *      MAMA_STATUS_NULL_ARG
00197  *      MAMA_STATUS_INVALID_ARG
00198  *      MAMA_STATUS_OK
00199  *      Other error codes from the mama functions.
00200  */
00201 MAMAExpDLL
00202 extern mama_status
00203 mamaFieldCache_applyRecord(mamaFieldCache fieldCache,
00204                            const mamaFieldCacheRecord record);
00205
